Casterbridge Local Authority (UKPRN: 123456) £15,000,000
Published: 18 July 2022

Funding breakdown

Schools block

£3,750,000

Central school services block

£3,750,000

High needs block

£3,750,000

Early years block

£3,750,000

Download DSG allocation for ABC 2021 to 2022

  • Open Document Spreadsheet(ODS), 27KB

  • This file is in an OpenDocument format. You may need a different format if you're using assistive technology. Request an accessible format.

Payment Dates

  • There are no more scheduled payments for financial year 2021 to 2022. You can review more information on payments on DSG:conditions of grant 2021 to 2022.

Allocation history

You can view all versions of this allocation for the financial year 2021 to 2022 and previous years on the allocation history.

General DSG resources

  • Get more general guidance on DSG: 2021 to 2022 (opens in a new tab).
